Reviews.Title: “Perfect Base”

Reviews.Content: liked hotel beginning twoweek vacation italy september arrived morning incredibly jetlagged ready manager front desk offered complimentary breakfast soon ready crash hours wasn’t overly friendly professional understanding tired appreciated trip rome location hotel perfect – walking distance spanish steps plus near metro stop taxi stand close via veneto la dolce vita fame cafes outside seats sold expensive drinks people watching clean modern sunny enjoyed breakfast offered options quickly spoiled can’t wait plan return trip rome definitely stay
